content.p: The Malaysian Qualifications Agency (MQA) has developed a code of practice on criteria and standards for higher education in Malaysia. The MQA Standards must be complied by the higher education providers (HEP) and foreign branch campuses in conducting higher education programmes. In addition to the UK higher education academic standards and quality, University of Nottingham Malaysia will adhere to the MQA Standards related to candidate selection. The University will do everything we can to support applicants and we may also ask you to provide further information to help us assess your application. General enquiries: +60 3 8924 8000 Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays) Programme enquiries: +60 3 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia
